Articles.Content:
This is a bran new series on my channel where we set out to build a Kerbal Colony on the inner-most moon of Jool, Laythe. Of course we will be doing other stuff along the way like a Munar communications base and Inter-Planetry Space Stations. The channel is dedicated to KSP so if you do head over I would be really appereciative, and if you like what you see, make sure to subscribe and stick around:

http://m.youtube.com/channel/UCbpRRJY2ML2Ek1eaVVCelbw

Thanks

Knowlesie
